commentBody:
It's getting effortless. That's what I like the most.

I didn't watch any football games last weekend and won't this weekend. I know that makes me an outlier on this digital turf. What I have done instead is watched a wonderfully entertaining Chelsea Everton match this morning. Great example of Premier League English football.

Some time ago I started getting repulsed by the obvious intent to injure which happened on many NFL "plays." Particularly the helmet on helmet spearing. Which was then interpreted by enthusiastic announcers as a "really big hit!"

The gladiatorial aspect of it became too stomach turning for me. Sorry, but the NFL is bloodsport. Plain and simple.

It's liberating to have oneself freed from the NFL game schedule.

You might try it.
